about_the_game:
INTRODUCTION

Prime of Flames is a special strategy game that combines Wargame and Roguelike. You will lead the warriors of different clans to find the truth of history. Each clan has its own unique playstyle and so does each class. You can recruit a beast army to help you, or build a huge Bronion Works, or even construct a magic field to defeat powerful enemies. Each fight plays out differently, so let your creativity run wild.

WORLD OUTLOOK

The ancestors once built a great and prosperous country in the Wilderness, and each clan lived and multiplied with the help of the ancestors. Until the day disaster came, the meteorite destroyed the world of the ancestors, while the demons, ghosts and orcs ravaged this land, and even the witches who sheltered Human broke their covenant and disappeared. As the guider of the former ancestors, you revived and arrived. In the name of Star Envoy, you leave for the Human camp, and lead the warriors of different clans with talents and abilities to find the truth of history and disaster...

FEATURES

  • Plenty of unique encounters with varying terrain, enemies and challenges to overcome.
  • Over a hundred of characters from different clans, each with their own unique twist on their class playstyle.
  • Turn based combat with no movement order. Such system is easy to pick up, allowing for anyone to enjoy some fun strategizing.
  • Experience the story in stage mode, or face various challenges in endless mode.

About Demo

Demo Contents: Three Clans - Ninelie, Bronion and Evernight & Chapter I & Three Stages.

Note: The Save file can not be used in full version. I am sorry about that!

Starting Game Issue

If you got any issues when starting the game. Please check this SOLUTION, or join our Discord.

About ESC

You can press ESC anytime during the game, and use the features like Skip Guide/Home Menu/Restart/Retreat/Settings.


Note: When you get an Event which needs to consume resources, please DO NOT exit the game or back to Home Menu before the Event is finished.

About GameMode

There are 2 modes in the game, Chapters and Endless Mode. You can click "Journey" in Camp to start Chapter, and "Abyss" to start Endless Mode. Abyss is unavailable in Demo.

About SaveFile

Journey and Endless Mode are sharing SaveFile right now. "Continue" in Home Menu will start the game where you played from last time, and "New Game" will reset the process and enter the Camp again.

About Settings

Gameplay-Game speed：2X will make the animation faster. But Close up shot is unavailable in this mode.

Gameplay-Close up shot：Switching On/Off，but it is unavailable in 2X mode.
Gameplay-Speed：On - Character will end her action automatically after being dragged to a cell.

About US

We are from RAYKA STUDIO which was built by several like-minded gamers. It is really glad to meet you here. Prime of Flames is the first game of our studio, also is the start of Taikoo World Outlook. We hope to present a special strategy game.
Welcome to join us. Let us ignite the ancient fire together, and lead to the gate of the ancient journey that is about to open!

Please kindly reach out to us in Steam Community or Discord if you have any questions in the game. Really hope to make the game better with your help and support!
